title: Get Involved with Builder Vancouver
description: Want to help keep Builder Vancouver running? We are always looking for extra hands to welcome people, jot down wins, or send a short recap.
impactStatement: If you can spare an hour, that is enough to keep the next builder night rolling.

contact.label: Reach the organizing team
instructions: Use the subject line "I Want to Help" so we can triage fast.

meta.title: Get Involved | Builder Vancouver
meta.description: Quick note on how to help Builder Vancouver and where to email the organizers.
